```{python}
import ssb_pubmd as ssb
```

{% for highchart in section.highcharts -%}

```{python}
highchart = ssb.Highchart(
    title="{{ highchart.metadata.title }}",
    graph_type="{{ highchart.metadata.graph_type }}",
    dataframe=df,
    xlabel="{{ highchart.metadata.xlabel }}",
    ylabel="{{ highchart.metadata.ylabel }}",
)
ssb.create("{{ highchart.id }}", highchart)
```

{% endfor -%}


{% for factbox in section.factboxes -%}

```{python}
factbox = ssb.Factbox(
    title="{{ block.metadata.title }}",
    display_type="{{ block.metadata.display_type }}",
)
ssb.create("{{ block.id }}", factbox)
```

{% endfor -%}
